revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: The account of Charles Case, Esq. of New Orleans, Attorney at law, for his services as special counsel of the United States, by assignment and order of the court, with the consent of the Dist. Attorney, has been approved for the sum of three hundred dollars, being the fee taxed by the court, and forwarded to the Secretary of the Interior for due settlement.
